about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to play as a drunken martial arts master, that’s ready to beat down ninjas with fists? Well now you can with this DLC fighting stance that makes the game more fun.

*This DLC is a set of fighting animations and purely cosmetic. It doesn’t give any advantages in the game whatsoever, but it is always a nice way to support us.
detailed_description:
Have you ever wanted to play as a drunken martial arts master, that’s ready to beat down ninjas with fists? Well now you can with this DLC fighting stance that makes the game more fun.

*This DLC is a set of fighting animations and purely cosmetic. It doesn’t give any advantages in the game whatsoever, but it is always a nice way to support us.
name: The Grandmaster - Drunken Movement Set

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy The Grandmaster - Drunken Movement Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.0 Gghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 5 Series
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 3.0 ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 7 Series
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
